ComicInfo.Penciller: Carlos Ezquerra,Henry Flint,Jake Lynch,Mark Harrison,Simon Davis
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jump on board with one of comics’ creative powerhouses – Prog 1928 sees the fifth episodes in the brand-new line-up of stunning stories! Judge Dredd - Enceladus: New Life by Rob Williams and Henry Flint reaches a temporary conclusion; Johnny Alpha finds himself outnumbered but is he outgunned in Strontium Dog: The Stix Fix Job by John Wagner and Carlos Ezquerra; Celtic barbarian Sláine battles against the Drune Lords in the second book of The Brutania Chronicles, Primordial, by Pat Mills and Simon Davis; the Russian assassin Orlok continues his new mission in The Rasputin Caper by Arthur Wyatt and Jake Lynch; and things get brutal on the other side of the line in Grey Area: Another Day On The Job by Dan Abnett and Mark Harrison.
Cover: Mark Harrison
Judge Dredd - Enceladus New Life (Part Five) (Rob Williams - Henry Flint)Orlok: Agent of East-Meg One - The Rasputin Caper (Part Five) (Arthur Wyatt - Jake Lynch)Sláine: The Brutania Chronicles Book Two - Primordial (Part Five) (Pat Mills - Simon Davis)Grey Area - Locked In (Part Two) (Dan Abnett - Mark Harrison)Stronium Dog - The Stix Fix (Part Five) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1928
ComicInfo.Writer: Arthur Wyatt,Dan Abnett,John Wagner,Pat Mills,Rob Williams
